definition: to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
unjust accusation/miscarriage of justice

sentences.english: The one eyed Wang Huaie directs the truth of how he framed and disc for Jing kui.
sentences.chinese: 独眼龙将王怀锷指使他如何陷害景逵的实情和盘供出。

sentences.english: Chan Fuquan designs circumvent, make Dong Shaohua get killed.
sentences.chinese: 单福全设计陷害，使得董邵华丧命。

sentences.english: One who gives false witness against his neighbour is a hammer and a sword and a sharp arrow.
sentences.chinese: 作假见证陷害邻舍的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: Later Sun Bin was framed by Pang Juan and the Prince of Wei had his kneecaps cut out .
sentences.chinese: 后来，孙膑受庞涓陷害，被魏王剜掉了两个膝盖骨。

sentences.english: When you are being maligned falsely, don't retaliate. Leave it with Him.
sentences.chinese: 当你被人陷害时，不要报复，而是交托给主。

sentences.english: But, she told the jury, that doesn't mean there was a frame-up.
sentences.chinese: 但是她告诉陪审团，那并不意味着有什么陷害。

sentences.english: I know she is the woman who knifed me in the back.
sentences.chinese: 我知道是她在背后陷害了我。

sentences.english: I do not wish to see someone of you do bad things to the other campains.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望看到有谁故意设局陷害别的选手。

sentences.english: Peter tells us that, when we are being hated and maligned by the world.
sentences.chinese: 彼得告诉我们，当我们被这个世界憎恨和陷害时。

sentences.english: Harry gets put in the Triwizard Tournament. With dragons and mermaids.
sentences.chinese: 哈利被陷害参加了三强争霸赛，关卡中有龙有人鱼。

sentences.english: Like a club or a sword or a sharp arrow is the man who gives false testimony against his neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 作假见证陷害邻舍的，就是大磓，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: The accused man siad that he had been framed.
In desperation, he decided to throw the helve after the hatchet, in tribute tea against Hu poisoned.
sentences.chinese: 情急之下，他决定孤注一掷，在贡茶里下毒陷害胡家。

sentences.english: A man that beareth false witness against his neighbour [is] a maul, and a sword, and a sharp arrow.
sentences.chinese: 作假见证陷害邻舍的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

sentences.english: Peter seems toh ave set a cunning tr ap for you.
sentences.chinese: 皮特好像设了狡猾的圈套要陷害你。

sentences.english: I don't want to find out about anyone having any design to kick out his .
sentences.chinese: 我不希望看到有谁故意设局陷害别的选手。

definition: to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to frame/to bring false charges against
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to impute/to shift the blame onto someone else
to frame sb/to accuse falsely
to damage by calumny
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to use public office to avenge private wrongs
to incite/to stir up/to instigate
to lodge an accusation/accusation (law)
to plot against
crafty scoundrel/villain
to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
